column4: Panasonic expects Tesla battery biz to contribute to profit as early as October
column5: TOKYO Panasonic Corp on Tuesday said it expects its battery business with U.S. electric vehicle maker Tesla to contribute to profit from the second half of its business year  as production of mass-market Model 3 cars picks up pace.

column4: UPDATE 1-Panasonic expects Tesla battery biz to contribute to profit as early as October
column5: * CFO says Panasonic didn't receive discount request from Tesla (Recast with executive comments on Tesla battery business)

column4: Panasonic's Q1 profit rises 19 pct as factory equipment sales offsets battery costs
column5: TOKYO  July 31 Japan's Panasonic Corp on Tuesday reported a 19 percent increase in first-quarter profit  beating estimates  as strong demand for factory automation equipment offset costs incurred ramping up automotive battery plants.

column4: UPDATE 1-Dialog Semiconductor ends talks to buy Synaptics
column5: July 31 Dialog Semiconductor Plc said on Tuesday it has ended discussions with Synaptics Inc about a potential acquisition of the U.S. touch-pad technology company  without citing a reason.

column4: Dialog Semiconductor ends talks to buy Synaptics
column5: July 31 Dialog Semiconductor Plc said on Tuesday it has terminated discussions with Synaptics Inc about a potential acquisition of the U.S. touch-pad technology company  without citing a reason.
